extName.message: Felo - Your Free AI Search Assistant

extDescription.message: Search the world in your own language and enhance your social networking content search, all for free.

felo_search_placeholder.message: Type in what you want to search

language_description.message: Set your preferred language for interface and AI responses.

default_search_engine_description.message: When **enabled**, Felo Search will be set as your browser's default search engine.

felo_it_button_description.message: When turned on, the felo it button will be available in the search box

felo_it_button_disabled_list_description.message: List of websites where this feature is disabled

selection_menu_description.message: Show mini menu when selecting text

target_language_description.message: Translate other languages into the language you set

translate_language_same_as_ai_response.message: Same as the AI responses output language

translate_display_style_description.message: See below for examples of different translation styles

translation_original_text_display_descri.message: When **enabled**, the original text remains visible on the page; when **disabled**, only the translation is shown.

started_head_title.message: Welcome to the Felo Search Assistant!

started_head_subtitle.message: Search the world in your own language

started_welcome.message: ðŸŽ‰ Congratulations! Your AI search assistant is ready to go

started_set_felo_default_search_engine.message: Set Felo Search as default search engine

error_google_title.message: Google Translate service is not responding

error_bing_title.message: Microsoft Translator service is not responding

error_guide_to_google_mode.message: 👉 Switch the translation engine to Google Translate

error_guide_to_bing_mode.message: 👉 Switch the translation engine to Microsoft Translator

translate_page_auto_description.message: When enabled, the assistant will automatically translate foreign language web pages (limited to pages opened from Felo)
